DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Biomarkers ( pro adrenomedullin ( MR proADM ) , pro arginin vasopressin ( CT proAVP ) , pro atrial natriuretic peptid ( MR proANP ) , Pro Endothelin ) change Day 2 , Day 5 Day 7 ICU admission correlate Intravascular volume assess Cr 51 red blood cell ( Day 2 Day 7 ) I 125 albumine Day 7 . The correlation Biomarkers also evaluted marker erythropoietin catecholamine . 80 ICU patient include .
DOC.criteria: 20 Cerebral Hemorrhage 20 Head Injury 20 post surgery non traumatic non neuro 20 Polytrauma patient Heart failure NYHA III IV Renal insufficiency creatinin clearance < 30 ml/mn age < 18 Y Pregnancy
